item.title: New Container: Filezilla
item.description: We have released a new container for Filezilla! FIleZilla Client is a fast and reliable cross-platform FTP, FTPS and SFTP client with lots of useful features and an intuitive graphical user interface.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Filezilla!

FIleZilla Client is a fast and reliable cross-platform FTP, FTPS and SFTP client with lots of useful features and an intuitive graphical user interface.
